text: We could totally fly a drone however we want on an aircraft carrier.

Haha. We can't carry "uninstalled" LiPo batteries because they are hazardous materials. "However, spare (uninstalled) lithium batteries would meet the definition of hazardous material and may not be carried on the sUAS."
Also can't fly near the president or other public figure.

Huh. "You may also operate an sUAS to transport another personâ€™s property (cargo) for compensation or hire provided you comply with the additional requirements described below.

The total weight of the sUAS (including the cargo) must remain below 55lbs"
I thought this is contradictory to what I read before on the circular.
